pageContext.claim: “Got to see, by accident, wacko comedian Bill Maher’s show - So many lies. He said patients in El Paso hospital didn't want to meet with me. Wrong! Had really great meetings with numerous patients.”
pageContext.analysis: Maher was referring to a report in The Washington Post, in which a spokesperson for the University Medical Center in El Paso said that none of the eight patients being treated for injuries from the recent mass shooting agreed to meet with Trump during his visit. “This is a very sensitive time in their lives. Some of them said they didn't want to meet with the president, some of them didn't want any visitors,” UMC spokesman Ryan Mielke said.
